title: Give the gift of productivity with PDF Expert, now under $70
content:
Macworld

With how much we work with PDFs, having a PDF reader and manager is essential. Unfortunately, PDFs aren’t the easiest to manipulate for Mac users. If you or another Apple lover need a better way to work with PDFs, check out PDF Expert.

Now through November 9th, the top-rated PDF reader and manager, PDF Expert, is only $69.99. It’s an ideal and highly practical gift for any Mac user!

PDF Expert has more than 30 million users worldwide and has been named an Editor’s Choice and App of the Year winner by Apple. It’s not hard to see why.

The intuitive app makes it easy to edit, annotate, organize, convert, fill out, and scan PDFs with a comprehensive suite of tools. From making in-line edits and collaborating on a document to saving space on your computer by converting and compressing files, e-signing documents, and much more, PDF Expert is a must-add to your office suite.

Check out what else you can do with PDF Expert:

  • Redact information on PDFs
  • Enhance scans
  • Split PDFs
  • Comment and add stamps on PDFs
  • And much more!

Revolutionize the way you or a loved one work with PDFs.

Get a lifetime license to PDF Expert for just $69.99. No coupon is required, but this deal ends November 9th at 11:59pm Pacific!

 

PDF Expert One-Time Purchase: Lifetime License – $69.99
